Fast and Secure Websites - Static Sites

March 16, 2015 | advice

Chakir Mrabet

Nowadays many websites are built using a Content Management System or CMS such as WordPress, Drupal or Joomla. They allow the user to manage all their content through nice administrator control screens, and PHP, ASP.NET, or whatever server side technology the CMS is built on, will magically and dynamically create the website pages every single time a visitor hits the page.

Building a website using a CMS is one of the many ways the Internet has become so powerful, since the old days when all websites were just a link or two and a flash banner. As a matter of fact, in 2015, 23.9% of the websites are made on WordPress, but using a CMS also involves having to deal with issues related to deployment, security, performance and maintenance.

However using a CMS is not the only way to create a website. Building them exclusively on HTML static files is still one of the most efficient methods of creating fast and secure websites that still conform a big portion of the 60.4% that are not using a CMS.

We have launched!

January 26, 2015 | events

Amal Boujenna

We have launched Softelos, a small web design and development agency based in Lynchburg, right in the heart of Virginia. Softelos provides professional websites and cutting edge web applications for clients all over the United States.

We’re looking forward to working with many wonderful clients, and provide them the expertise we acquired as designers and software developers for different companies along the last years, so do not hesitate to contact us telling us about the project you have in mind, we will make it happen technically!.

We provide a fresh approach to web design and development. Our focus relies heavily on beautiful designs and implementations based on top notch web technologies. We’re always learning so that we can incorporate new technologies in our project as soon as they emerge. It’s a balance that we’ve perfected by our hunger for learning and our desire to achieve new challenges.

We also have a unique process approach that we apply to any project we work on, and which is based on rapid design and individual development phases. We care about long standing relationships, repeatedly delivery excellence, and building teams which extract the best in ourselves and brands we work with.
